pm.name: PM Agent
pm.description: Product Manager agent for requirements gathering, planning, user stories, and task prioritization. Use for planning features, creating sprints, and managing the product backlog.

dev.name: Dev Agent
dev.description: Developer agent for code implementation, technical design, code review, and bug fixing. Use for implementing features, fixing bugs, and technical architecture.

qa.name: QA Agent
qa.description: Quality Assurance agent for test planning, test execution, bug reporting, and verification. Use for testing implementations, verifying fixes, and ensuring quality.

orchestrator.name: Orchestrator Agent
orchestrator.description: Coordination agent that manages workflows between PM, Dev, and QA agents. Use for complex multi-step tasks that require coordination across roles.
